p: Additional to these six demanding characteristics, material demand reduction introduces further challenges for communicators and mediators. In the remainder of this section, I set points raised by Allwood et al.'s wide ranging White Paper [ 2] and associated publications [ 1, 4], and in the discussion of the White Paper offered by SÃ¶derholm & Tilton [ 3] within the context of broadcast decision-making. These specific challenges include the challenge of telling stories about systems. They also include the fact that there are only very limited broadcast spaces available for the exploration of fundamental challenges to mainstream political economy and everyday life.
